author: Siobhan Hughes
title: Facebook’s Mark Zuckerberg Testifies Before Congress: What to Watch
text:
WASHINGTON—Lawmakers pressing Facebook Inc. on its handling of personal user data turn their sights this week to the company’s chief executive, Mark Zuckerberg, who has begun a public campaign to repair the damage from a recently disclosed privacy controversy. Here are five things to watch for when a pair of Senate committees and a House committee hold hearings on Tuesday and Wednesday:
1) Can Mr. Zuckerberg project contrition in an unscripted setting?
...
